rule.name: CM_MI_AgeDebtPagingGridGroupByBrandName
rule.description: Contains Age Debt Paging Grid Group By Brand Name
rule.definition:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField"( label:"", totalCount:ri!AgeDebtDatasubset.totalCount, columns:{ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:"Brand - Location", data:index(ri!AgeDebtDatasubset.data,"BrandName",{}), links:apply(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(value:_,saveInto:local!FilterByBrandName),index(ri!AgeDebtDatasubset.data,"BrandName",{})), field:"BrandName" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:"Total Amount", data:index(ri!AgeDebtDatasubset.data,"AmountTotal",{}), field:"AmountTotal" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:"Current (Between 1-30 days)", data:index(ri!AgeDebtDatasubset.data,"Days_1_30",{}), field:"Days_1_30" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:"Between 31-60 days", data:index(ri!AgeDebtDatasubset.data,"Days_31_60",{}), field:"Days_31_60" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:"Between 61-90 days", data:index(ri!AgeDebtDatasubset.data,"Days_61_90",{}), field:"Days_61_90" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:"Between 3-6 Months", data:index(ri!AgeDebtDatasubset.data,"Months_3_6",{}), field:"Months_3_6" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:"Between 6-12 Months", data:index(ri!AgeDebtDatasubset.data,"Months_6_12",{}), field:"Months_6_12" ),
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:"Between 12-18 Months", data:index(ri!AgeDebtDatasubset.data,"Months_12_18",{}), field:"Months_12_18" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:"Between 18-24 Months", data:index(ri!AgeDebtDatasubset.data,"Months_18_24",{}), field:"Months_18_24" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:"Between 24-30 Months", data:index(ri!AgeDebtDatasubset.data,"Months_24_30",{}), field:"Months_24_30" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:"After 30 Months", data:index(ri!AgeDebtDatasubset.data,"Months_30",{}), field:"Months_30" ) }, value:ri!pagingInfo, saveInto:ri!pagingInfo )
